hero.title: Hi, I'm Jose Rosano, a passionate
hero.subtitle: Fullstack Developer.
typewriterTexts: I love coding and creating innovative solutions
Explore my projects and learn more about me

about.title: About Me
about.description:
Fullstack Developer specialized in Next.js, React, and MongoDB, with experience in multi-tenant architectures and SaaS applications.

Recently developed Reservá5, a complete sports facility reservation management system with authentication, admin dashboard, and automated WhatsApp notifications.

My stack: Next.js 15, React, Node.js, MongoDB, TailwindCSS, NextAuth, API integrations (Twilio, Cloudinary).

Looking for opportunities to apply my skills in challenging projects and continue growing as a developer.
about.emailLabel: Open to collaborations and new projects

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my recent projects.

reserva5.title: Reservá5
reserva5.description: Football field reservation system with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Next Auth.

weather.description: Real-time weather app using OpenWeatherMap API with location-based forecasts.

todoListJS.title: Todo List JS

kinesiologyLanding.title: Kinesiology Landing
